can I change my HW address?: - are you wanting to change you MAC address?
yes, is it possible? I don't have this option at BIOS (laptop)
did it give an error message, just not change it?
i think it was an incorrect use...
try this in your /etc/network/interfaces file "hwaddress ether 00:00:00:00:00:00"
- I just got it to work "ifconfig eth0 hw ether 00:00:00:00:00:00"
I got with ifdown eth0 / ifconfig eth0 hw ether 00:00:00:00:00:00, thanks
